SEARCH
Package com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Patient.controller

Class PersonAddressController

java.lang.Object
com.mediLaboSolutions.T2D2Patient.controller.PersonAddressController
@RestController public class PersonAddressController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the persons residences. Residences are the relationship between persons and addresses. In the database, they are represented by a join table : person_address
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon

  • Method Details

    • getPersonAddressesByPersonId

      @GetMapping("/residences/persons/{personId}/addresses") public List<Address> getPersonAddressesByPersonId(@PathVariable("personId") int personId)
      A GetMapping method on the /residences/persons/{personId}/addresses URI with a person id as PathVariable. It calls the eponymous IPersonAddressService method and returns a list of Address model entities whose id is attached, in the database, to the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Address list.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      residence.service.ts : getResidencesByPersonId(personId: number)

    • getPersonAddressesByPersonEmail

      @GetMapping("/residences/persons/email/{personEmail}/addresses") public List<Address> getPersonAddressesByPersonEmail(@PathVariable("personEmail") String personEmail)
      A GetMapping method on the /residences/persons/email/{personEmail}/addresses URI with a person email as PathVariable. It calls the eponymous IPersonAddressService method and returns a list of Address model entities whose id is attached, in the database, to the id of the person is passed as parameter.
      Returns:
      A Address list.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      residence.service.ts : getResidencesByPersonEmail(personEmail: string)

    • addPersonAddress

      @PostMapping("/residence") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Integer> addPersonAddress(@RequestBody PersonAddressAddDto personAddressAddDto)
      A PostMapping method on the /residence URI with an PersonAddressAddDto DTO as RequestBody. It calls the eponymous IPersonAddressService method and returns an Integer used by the front end to determine the success of the request with status code 201. If the result is null, it returns status code 400.
      Returns:
      An Integer and a status code.
      Front-end calling method(s) :
      residence.service.ts : addResidence(residenceValue: ResidenceValue)

    • deletePersonAddress

      @DeleteMapping("/residences/persons/{personId}/addresses/{addressId}") public void deletePersonAddress(@PathVariable("personId") int personId, @PathVariable("addressId") int addressId)
      A DeleteMapping method on the /residences/persons/{personId}/addresses/ URI with the a person id and an address id as PathVariables. It calls the eponymous IPersonAddressService method and returns nothing.
      Singularity :
      Method created for testing purposes with Postman. Could be use for administration.
